files.description: Main certification information page. Contains disclaimer, certification details, cost disclosures, and the Data Exchange/Extraction section with links to FHIR API documentation. This is the registered (b)(10) URL.

OpenAPI 3.0.1 specification for the single-patient FHIR API ('Med A-Z FHIR'). Documents 90 API paths covering CRUD, search, and pagination for 19 US Core resource types plus application registration endpoints. This is the machine-readable version of the Swagger UI at fhirapi.mhealthaz.com/swagger/index.html.

OpenAPI 3.0.1 specification for the bulk FHIR API ('Med A-Z FHIRBulk'). Documents 37 API paths including Group-level $export, export-poll-status, download, and individual resource endpoints. Implements FHIR Bulk Data Access specification.

FHIR Bundle containing Endpoint resources for the single-patient API. Lists 19 resource types (AllergyIntolerance through Provenance) with their API URLs and contact information. Service discovery document last modified September 21, 2022.
FHIR Bundle containing Endpoint resources for the bulk/system-to-system API. Lists the same 19 resource types as fhirsingle.xml. Service discovery document last modified September 21, 2022.
FHIR CapabilityStatement from the single-patient API. Confirms US Core IG v3.1.1, FHIR R4 (4.0.1), 20 resource types all using standard US Core profiles. No custom profiles or extensions defined.
FHIR CapabilityStatement from the bulk API. Confirms US Core IG v3.1.1, FHIR R4 (4.0.1), 20 resource types all using standard US Core profiles. Implementation URL is fhirbulk.mhealthaz.com.
Full-page screenshot of the certification information page showing all sections: Disclaimer, Certification Information, Costs, Data Exchange/Extraction, and Multifactor Authentication.
Screenshot of the Swagger UI for the single-patient FHIR API showing the 'Med A-Z FHIR' v2 OAS3 documentation with AllergyIntolerance and CarePlan endpoint groups visible.
Screenshot of the Swagger UI for the bulk FHIR API showing the 'Med A-Z FHIRBulk' v2 OAS3 documentation with BulkData, ContentLocation, and FhirAllergyIntolerance endpoint groups visible.
